Name: Landmarks, Frederick Douglass Memorial Park, Staten Island (N 240410 HIR).
Title: Application number N 240410 HIR (Frederick Douglass Memorial Park) submitted by the Landmarks Preservation Commission, pursuant to Section 3020 of the New York City Charter and Section 25-303 of the Administrative Code of the City of New York, for the designation of the Frederick Douglass Memorial Park, located at 3201 Amboy Road (Block 4475, Lot 300), as an historic landmark (DL-541/LP-2682), Borough of Staten Island, Community District 3, Council District 50.
BodyName: Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Sitings and Dispositions

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
This Land Use Application was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Land Use
This Land Use Application was Referred to Comm by Council to the Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Sitings and Dispositions
